title: 3 and Out - Saints School Brady, Kliff's Cards Collapsing, Mac Jones Reality Check
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Saints School Brady, Kliff's Cards Collapsing, Mac Jones Reality Check
description:
John reacts to the Saints shutting out Tom Brady and what it means for the Bucs chances to win another Super Bowl, why Kliff Kingsbury's Cardinals are looking at another season with a second half collapse, and why Belichick can't win a Super Bowl with Mac Jones this year.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
